original_text: These are the people of the province who came up from the captivity of the exiles whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had taken captive (they returned to Jerusalem and Judah, each to his own town,
korean_text: 옛적에 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살에게 사로잡혀 갔던 자들 중에서 놓임을 받고 예루살렘과 유다에 돌아와 각기 자기들의 성읍에 이른 자들 곧

sentences.original_text: These are the people of the province
who came up from the captivity of the exiles
whom Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon had taken captive
they returned to Jerusalem and Judah
